thread.section_title: Babbel.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Babbel.com | babbel.com | 4 von 164
thread.title: Francois Nader

author: Francois Nader
title: Francois Nader
text:
Babbel is not the only place where I'm learning a new language, but Babbel showed me that they have an excellent method of teaching. Easily the best in the bunch I'm using. Starts in a very easy to grasp way, explains everything as I proceed, and gets me to understand and speak the language far faster than any other online language learning services I've tried so far.
The learning process is providing the answers to the 'whys' I'm asking where others are not giving me all the answers.
Well worth the purchase.
